auth_errors.missing_token: Access denied. No authentication token provided.
auth_errors.invalid_token_format: Access denied. Invalid authentication token format.
auth_errors.blacklisted_token: Access denied. The provided token has been blacklisted.
auth_errors.unauthorized: Access denied. You are not authorized to perform this action.
auth_errors.login_google_error: Google login failed: No email returned

user_errors.invalid_email_or_password: Invalid email or password. Please try again.
user_errors.user_exist: A user with this email already exists.
user_errors.user_creation_failed: An error occurred while creating the user. Please try again later.
user_errors.user_not_found: No user found with the provided details.

todo_errors.todo_not_found: The requested to-do item was not found.
todo_errors.user_already_friend: User is already a friend of this Todo

permission_errors.only_owner: Only the owner can perform this action on this todo
permission_errors.read_only: You do not have permission to modify this todo
permission_errors.not_accessible: You do not have access to todo

request_body_errors.missing_todo_id: Todo IDs must be provided in the request body as an array
request_body_errors.date_format_error: Invalid date format. Ensure YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm or valid ISO format.
